page.title: 04EDUCATION
page.content: There are two Primary schools, one in Dringhouses and one in Woodthorpe. They provide education for children of four plus to eleven years of age. They also provide an outlet for parental talents.There is a {Parents {Association} at each school. The parents organize Summer fairs, discos for children and jumble sales as well as many other events. They raise money for much needed extra equipment in the schools. Parents also assist in the schools as classroom helpers where invaluable work is done. Due to the reorganization of the secondary school system in York this year (1985) there is only one secondary school in our area but three others are very close making a group of four from which parents can choose to send their children.
